name: Circled (Draelent) (Draelent)
description:
Cover the targets with the right number of circles.

You will need Reflexion, Precision and Timing to finish all 50 levels.

Available on the Play Store for Android !

CONTROLS: Click or Tap to grow a circle

nVn: Level design

Draelent: Developer & Artist

Beware! This game may seem easy, but becomes challenging at some point...
